channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Email Extension Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Email Extension Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2232|2024-08-04T07:01:41.190Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20email%20extension%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Email Extension Plugin 2.72 and 2.73 transmits and displays the SMTP password in plain text as part of the global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in its exposure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2253|2024-08-04T07:01:41.510Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20email%20extension%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Email Extension Plugin 2.75 and earlier does not perform hostname validation when connecting to the configured SMTP server.
